TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program MULTIPLAYER War Series

Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbals of Kerbin, This is an urgent report! There is a battle going on between two factions in space. The 71 faction is clashing with the WCS-701 Faction and it is chaos up there. We are trying to get as much on air as possible but sometimes our cameras are not able to see it. Heres some footage of this ongoing conflict.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AcHKwbPuV6w?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
The First 2 Non cinematic episodes are up at [https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLsfzoeKb4ZKz0QUgqJfb4kqrj3iJ1lbO0](https://www.youtube.com/FTWG4M3RS)
Hey this post is on the forums twice. Just thought I'd let you know.
